item.title: [Rental] Behringer DeepMind 12 Polyphonic Synthesizer
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Endless creativity. The Behringer DeepMind 12 synthesizer offers a vast array of sounds and intuitive controls, inspiring musicians to explore new sonic territories with ease.
item.content:encoded:
Dive into a world of boundless sonic possibilities with the Behringer DeepMind 12 Polyphonic Synthesizer. Whether you’re a seasoned pro or just starting your musical journey, this powerhouse of a synthesizer is designed to inspire and elevate your sound to new heights.
Featuring 12 voices of pure analog power, the DeepMind 12 offers rich, warm tones that will breathe life into your music. With its extensive modulation options, dual FX engines, and comprehensive control panel, you have the tools to sculpt your sound exactly the way you envision it.
Explore a universe of sound with over 1,000 factory presets, or unleash your creativity and craft your own unique patches from scratch. The intuitive interface makes sound design a breeze, allowing you to focus on your creativity without getting bogged down in technicalities.
Whether you’re performing live or producing in the studio, the DeepMind 12 is built to deliver. Its robust build quality and reliable performance ensure that it will stand up to the demands of any musical environment.
Experience the power of analog synthesis with the Behringer DeepMind 12 Polyphonic Synthesizer. Let your imagination run wild and discover a world of sonic possibilities like never before.

  • 49 Half-weighted full-size keys
  • Velocity sensitive keys with aftertouch
  • 4 FX engines powered by tc electronic and Klark Teknik
  • 24 oscillators – 2 OSCs and LFOs per voice
  • 3 ADSR generators
  • Switchable 2- or 4-pole low-pass filter per voice
  • High-pass filter
  • 8-Channel modulation matrix
  • 32-Step control sequencer
  • Envelope Depth
  • Key tracking
  • Remote controllable via iPad/PC/Mac, USB, MIDI or built-in Wi-Fi
  • 26 Knobs and one switch per function for direct access to all important parameters in real time
  • 1024 Programme memories
  • Built-in and adjustable Wi-Fi client
  • LC display
  • Dimensions (W x D x H): 822 x 257 x 103 mm
  • Weight: 8.4 kg
  • Designed and engineered in the U.K.
  • Suitable optional bag: Art.479789 (not included in delivery)
  • suitable optional case: Art.416352 (not included in delivery)

item.title: Behringer DeepMind 12 Polyphonic Synthesizer
item.dc:creator: Bianka
item.description: Endless creativity. The Behringer DeepMind 12 synthesizer offers a vast array of sounds and intuitive controls, inspiring musicians to explore new sonic territories with ease.
item.content:encoded:
Dive into a world of boundless sonic possibilities with the Behringer DeepMind 12 Polyphonic Synthesizer. Whether you’re a seasoned pro or just starting your musical journey, this powerhouse of a synthesizer is designed to inspire and elevate your sound to new heights.
Featuring 12 voices of pure analog power, the DeepMind 12 offers rich, warm tones that will breathe life into your music. With its extensive modulation options, dual FX engines, and comprehensive control panel, you have the tools to sculpt your sound exactly the way you envision it.

Whether you’re performing live or producing in the studio, the DeepMind 12 is built to deliver. Its robust build quality and reliable performance ensure that it will stand up to the demands of any musical environment.
Experience the power of analog synthesis with the Behringer DeepMind 12 Polyphonic Synthesizer. Let your imagination run wild and discover a world of sonic possibilities like never before.

item.title: Nord Stage 3 Digital Piano
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Professional-grade digital piano and synthesizer with versatile performance features.
item.content:encoded:
The Nord Stage 3 digital piano sets the standard for professional keyboard performance with its powerful sound engine, authentic instrument emulations, and intuitive user interface. Featuring Nord’s acclaimed hammer-action keybed, comprehensive effects section, and seamless integration with external gear, the Stage 3 offers unparalleled flexibility and expressiveness for stage and studio use. Whether you’re a pianist, organist, or synthesist, the Nord Stage 3 provides the tools you need to bring your music to life.

  • 88 Weighted keys with Aftertouch
  • Independent sections for piano, organ and synthesizer, each with its own layer mixer and transposition button
  • 2 Programmable scenes (sound setups) with inaudible programme changes
  • Comprehensive piano section with a choice of concert grand, upright and electric pianos
  • 120-Voice polyphony for piano section
  • 2 GB of memory for piano sounds
  • Organ section with 6 models: B3 Tonewheel, B3 Bass, Vox, Farfisa, x2 Pipe
  • LED drawbar, live mode, switchable vibrato/chorus, vintage 122 rotary speaker simulation and adjustable drive
  • Synthesiser section with Nord Wave 2 engine (virtual analogue, samples, FM and digital waves) and 3 layers
  • 48 Voices polyphony for synthesizer section
  • 1 GB memory for Nord Sample Library
  • Expanded arpeggiator with polyphonic, gate and pattern modes
  • Effects section per layer with reverb, delay, 2 modulation effects, compressor, amp simulation and EQ
  • OLED display for program and synth section
  • Wooden pitch-bend handle
  • Modulation wheel
  • Up to 3 split points (up to 4 zones) with LED indicators between zones
  • 4 Assignable audio outputs: 6.3 mm jack
  • Stereo headphone output: 6.3 mm jack
  • Stereo monitor input: 3.5 mm jack
  • Pedal inputs for sustain, expression and swell: 6.3 mm jack
  • Pedal inputs for programme selection and rotor control: 6.3 mm jack
  • MIDI In/Out: 5-pin DIN
  • USB-B port for USB-MIDI, software updates and sound transfer
  • Incl. operating instructions, USB cable and power cord

item.title: Roland Juno-DS88 Synthesizer Keyboard
item.dc:creator: Jose Caceres
item.description: Inspiring creativity. Expressive performance. The Roland Juno-DS88 synthesizer keyboard offers a wide range of sounds and intuitive controls, empowering musicians to unleash their musical ideas.
item.content:encoded:
Unleash your musical creativity with the Roland Juno-DS88 Synthesizer Keyboard. Designed for live performance and studio production, this versatile instrument offers a wide range of sounds and features to inspire your creativity. The Juno-DS88 features an 88-note weighted-action keyboard, providing a realistic piano feel and expressive playability. With over 1,000 high-quality sounds, including pianos, synths, strings, and drums, the Juno-DS88 offers endless sonic possibilities for every musical style. The intuitive interface and hands-on controls make it easy to create and manipulate sounds on the fly, while the built-in sequencer and sampler allow you to capture and arrange your ideas with ease. Whether you’re composing, performing, or producing, the Roland Juno-DS88 is the ultimate tool for unleashing your musical potential.

  • 76 velocity-sensitive keys
  • Includes all the sounds of the JUNO-Di plus additional new acoustic pianos, electric pianos, organ sounds and much more
  • Operation with mains adapter or batteries
  • Sound expansion possibilities through a virtual Wave Expansion slot
  • Sample import function
  • Up to 128-voice polyphony
  • More than 1200 preset patches
  • More than 30 drum kits
  • 64 performances
  • 256 user memory patches
  • 8 drum kits
  • 128 performances
  • 8 phrase pads for triggering samples and songs
  • Microphone input with special reverb, vocoder and pitch effects for impressive vocal performances
  • Intuitive 8 track pattern sequencer with a non-stop loop recording function for faster, more efficient development of song ideas
  • USB Audio/MIDI and DAW control mode
  • Dimensions (W x D x H): 1231 x 311 x 102 mm
  • Weight: 6.9 kg
  • Includes power supply

Connections:

  • Pedal hold socket
  • Pedal control socket
  • Microphone input: 6.3 mm jack
  • Input for external sources: Stereo mini jack
  • Output jacks (L/MONO, R): 6.3 mm jack
  • Headphone output: 6.3 mm stereo jack
  • MIDI connectors (in/out)
  • USB memory port
  • USB computer port (supports USB MIDI/audio)
  • DC socket for power supply unit

item.title: Casio CDP-S150 Digital Piano
item.dc:creator: Jose Caceres
item.description: Affordable excellence. The Casio CDP-S150 digital piano provides authentic piano sound and feel at an unbeatable price, making it perfect for beginners and experienced players alike.
item.content:encoded:
Discover the joy of playing piano with the Casio CDP-S150 Digital Piano. Combining premium sound quality, realistic keyboard action, and modern features, this compact and lightweight instrument is perfect for beginners and experienced players alike. The CDP-S150 features 88 fully weighted keys with scaled hammer action, providing authentic touch sensitivity and response. The AiR Sound Source technology delivers rich, expressive piano tones with dynamic range and nuance, while the built-in speaker system provides clear and immersive sound. With 10 high-quality instrument tones, including grand pianos, electric pianos, and organs, the CDP-S150 offers a wide range of musical options for practice, performance, and composition. Whether you’re playing at home, in the studio, or on the go, the Casio CDP-S150 Digital Piano is the perfect companion for your musical journey.

  • 88 Keys with scaled hammer action (Scaled Hammer Action Keyboard II hammer action)
  • 64 Voices polyphonic
  • 10 Sounds
  • Layer function
  • App function (Chordana Play for Piano)
  • Transposer function
  • Metronome
  • Reverb effect
  • Chorus
  • 2 Demo songs
  • USB to Host
  • 1 Headphone jack
  • 1 Pedal jack
  • Audio input
  • Loudspeaker: 2x 8 Watt
  • Dimensions (W x D x H): 1322 x 232 x 99 mm
  • Weight: 10.5 kg
  • Colour: Black
  • Battery operation possible (6x AA, not included)
  • Incl. SP-3 pedal,music rest and AD-A12150LW mains adapter
  • Colour: Black
  • Suitable stand CS-46P: Art. 457011 (not included in delivery)
  • Matching bag SC-800P: Art. 457013 (not included in delivery)

item.title: Moog Subsequent 25 Analog Synthesizer
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Pure analog power. Limitless creativity. The Moog Subsequent 25 synthesizer packs iconic Moog sound into a compact, performance-ready package, inspiring musicians to push the boundaries of sonic exploration.
item.content:encoded:
Embark on a sonic adventure with the Moog Subsequent 25 Analog Synthesizer. Building upon the legacy of Moog’s legendary synthesizers, the Subsequent 25 offers a compact yet powerful instrument that’s perfect for studio and stage use. Featuring two oscillators, a sub oscillator, and a noise generator, this synth delivers a wide range of classic and modern sounds, from fat basses and searing leads to lush pads and intricate textures. The redesigned filter circuit provides greater resonance and harmonic saturation, while the enhanced mixer section offers increased headroom and improved signal-to-noise ratio. With its intuitive interface, expressive controls, and iconic Moog sound, the Subsequent 25 is sure to inspire you to create music that’s out of this world.

  • 37 Velocity-sensitive keyboard with aftertouch
  • Mono- and duo paraphonic mode
  • Arpeggiator
  • Step Sequencer
  • 256 Presets
  • 40 Controls
  • 74 Button
  • LCD display
  • Classic Moog filter
  • Feedback
  • Multi Drive
  • 2 Modulation buses
  • DAHDSR envelopes
  • Dimensions (W x D x H): 679 x 375 x 171 mm
  • Weight: approx. 9.98 kg

Connections:

  • Line input 1/4″ mono jack
  • Line output 6.3 mm mono jack
  • Headphone output
  • MIDI I / O
  • USB

item.title: Roland FP-30 Digital Piano
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: Experience the joy of playing piano with the Roland FP-30 Digital Piano. Combining premium sound quality, realistic keyboard action, and modern features, the FP-30 is the perfect instrument for players of all levels. The SuperNATURAL Piano sound engine faithfully reproduces the rich, expressive tone of an acoustic grand piano, while the PHA-4 Standard keyboard delivers […]
item.content:encoded:
Experience the joy of playing piano with the Roland FP-30 Digital Piano. Combining premium sound quality, realistic keyboard action, and modern features, the FP-30 is the perfect instrument for players of all levels. The SuperNATURAL Piano sound engine faithfully reproduces the rich, expressive tone of an acoustic grand piano, while the PHA-4 Standard keyboard delivers authentic touch sensitivity and response. With 35 built-in instrument sounds, including electric pianos, strings, and organs, the FP-30 offers a wide range of musical options for practice, performance, and composition. Compact and portable, with built-in speakers and headphone output, the Roland FP-30 is the ideal choice for pianists who demand top-tier performance in a versatile, affordable package.

    • 88 Keys
    • PHA-4 keyboard with ivory touch
    • Sound engine: 12 Supernatural piano sounds, 20 electric pianos and 24 other sounds
    • Max. polyphony: 256 Voices
    • Built-in speaker system with 2x 12 cm speakers (2x 11 W)
    • Transpose function
    • Built-in metronome
    • Recording and playback of standard MIDI files (SMF) and audio (WAV and MP3) via USB stick
    • 30 Accompaniment songs
    • Keyboard modes: Normal, Dual, Split and Twin Piano
    • Dimensions (W x D x H): 1300 x 284 x 151 mm
    • Weight: 14.8 kg
    • Colour: Black
    • Includes operating instructions, external power supply unit (PSB-7U), sheet music holder and DP-2 sustain pedal

    Connectors:

    • Bluetooth Audio (V3.0) and Bluetooth MIDI (V4.0)
    • 2x 6.3 mm jack stereo output
    • 3.5 mm jack stereo headphone output
    • 6.3 mm jack stereo headphone output
    • 6.3 mm jack pedal input
    • Input for KPD-70 triple pedal unit (not included)
    • Power supply input: 12 V DC
    • USB A port for removable media
    • USB B port for computer connection

item.title: Yamaha PSR-E373 Portable Keyboard
item.dc:creator: Kosei Oki
item.description: On-the-go creativity. The Yamaha PSR-E373 portable keyboard offers a wide range of sounds and features in a compact, lightweight design, perfect for musicians on the move.
item.content:encoded:
Unleash your musical creativity with the Yamaha PSR-E373 Portable Keyboard. Packed with features and designed for ease of use, this versatile instrument is perfect for beginners and experienced players alike. The PSR-E373 features 61 touch-sensitive keys that respond to your playing dynamics, allowing for expressive performances with realistic nuance. With 622 high-quality instrument voices, 205 accompaniment styles, and 154 preset songs, you’ll never run out of inspiration. The onboard lesson function helps you learn to play at your own pace, while the USB-to-host connectivity allows you to connect to your computer or mobile device for even more music-making possibilities. Whether you’re playing at home, in the studio, or on the go, the Yamaha PSR-E373 is the perfect companion for your musical journey.

    • 61 Standard keys
    • 32-Voice polyphony
    • 136 Tones (incl. 41 World Voices)
    • 8 Drum kits (incl. 5 World drum kits)
    • 158 Accompaniment styles (incl. 75 World styles)
    • 69 Preset Songs
    • Duo Mode
    • One Touch Setting
    • Panel Sustain
    • Sync Start
    • Part Mute
    • Metronome
    • Transpose Function
    • Sound Boost
    • Smart Chord
    • Loudspeaker: 2 x 2.5 W
    • Battery power supply possible
    • Connections: Headphones, power supply
    • Dimensions (W x D x H): 920 x 266 x 73 mm
    • Weight: 2.8 kg incl. power supply unit (PA-130)

item.title: Korg Minilogue XD Polyphonic Analog Synthesizer
item.dc:creator: Marius Kieldsen
item.description: Limitless creativity. The Korg Minilogue XD synthesizer combines vintage analog warmth with modern digital versatility, inspiring musicians to explore new sonic possibilities.
item.content:encoded:
Unleash your creativity with the Korg Minilogue XD Polyphonic Analog Synthesizer. Building upon the success of the original Minilogue, this powerful instrument combines analog synthesis with digital technology, offering a vast array of sonic possibilities. The Minilogue XD features four voices of polyphony, with two analog oscillators and a digital multi-engine oscillator that can be customized with user-programmable waveforms. With its intuitive interface and 16-step sequencer, you can easily create complex sequences and evolving soundscapes on the fly. The built-in effects section includes reverb, delay, and modulation effects, allowing you to add depth and dimension to your sounds. Whether you’re a seasoned synth enthusiast or a beginner looking to explore new sonic territories, the Korg Minilogue XD is sure to inspire your creativity.

  • Korg Minilogue XD er en polyfonisk analog synth med masser af varme, punch og karakter.
  • XD versionen er en opgradering af den originale Minilogue, der bl.a. tilføjer digitale ‘Multi Engine’, der byder på noise, VPM og ‘user slot’ lyd generatorer.
  • Noise generatoren kan producere fire slags noise og er perfekt til perkussive lyde og lydeffekter.
  • VPM (Variable Phase Modulation) er en VPM/FM oscillator lader dig skabe skarpe og moderne lyde, som ellers ikke er muligt med en analog synth. 16 oscillator typer og ‘shape’ kontrol.
  • Den mest spændende feature i Multi Engine-delen, er ‘user slot’ – her kan du loade egne open source kreationer eller downloade brugergenererede oscillatorer fra nettet. Korg har således åbnet Minilogue for uanede mængder af kreativitet!
  • XD kommer med 200 presets og 500 programmer.
  • Effektmaskine – 32-bit floating point DSP effekter giver dig mulighed for at færdigproducere din synthlyd. Du får modutionseffekter, reverb og delay og alle tre kan bruges samtidigt. Du kan desuden loade bruger genererede effekter i de 16 ‘user slots’.
  • Brug Korgs SDK (Software Developer Kit) til at programmere effekter og oscillatorer.
  • Polyfonisk stepsequencer – 16 steps med dedikerer knapper, der både lader dig optage real time og i steps.
  • Joystik-style modulation/pitch kontrol.
  • 37 tangenter.
  • Stereo line out (jack).
  • CV og MIDI – kontrollér Minilogue XD via CV/gate eller MIDI over DIN stik og USB-B.

item.title: Yamaha YDP-144 Digital Piano
item.dc:creator: Marius Kieldsen
item.description: Authentic piano experience. The Yamaha YDP-144 digital piano combines realistic sound and touch with modern features, making it ideal for both beginners and experienced players.
item.content:encoded:
Experience the joy of playing piano with the Yamaha YDP-144 Digital Piano. Featuring Yamaha’s renowned Graded Hammer Standard (GHS) keyboard action, this instrument faithfully replicates the feel of an acoustic piano, with weighted keys that respond to your touch with precision and nuance. The Pure CF Sound Engine delivers authentic piano tones sampled from Yamaha’s acclaimed CFIIIS concert grand piano, while the built-in Damper Resonance technology recreates the subtle nuances of string resonance for a truly immersive playing experience. With 10 voices, 192-note polyphony, and a range of features including dual mode, split mode, and a built-in metronome, the Yamaha YDP-144 is the perfect choice for pianists of all levels.

  • 88 Weighted keys with hammer action (Graded Hammer, GHS)
  • 10 Sounds (incl. high-end sound from the Yamaha CFX grand piano)
  • 192-Voice polyphonic
  • Effects (reverb: 4 types, Stereophonic Optimizer, Intelligent Acoustic Control)
  • Midi recording (2 tracks)
  • Functions: dual, duo mode, metronome, transpose (-6 – +6), tuning (414.8 – 466.8 kHz)
  • Pedal unit: sustain (half pedal), sostenuto, soft
  • USB to host connection
  • 2 Headphone outputs: 6.3 mm stereo jack
  • Speaker: 2x 8 W
  • Dimensions (W x D x H): 1357 x 422 x 815 mm (height incl. sheet music holder – 969 mm)
  • Weight: 38 kg
  • Colour: Black
  • Incl. power supply unit (PA-150) and music book “50 Classical Music Masterpieces”
